title: Client crashed twice today
body:
Like it says in the title... 

Happened both times about 10 minutes in (i estimate...). The game goes into that laggy state where you can kinda see things moving but not do anything. Second time it wouldn't reconnect so I had to quit the client entirely then restart and reconnect. 

I also noticed that old "crunchy" distorted sound problem fairly common on OS X at one point too. Related? Was that fixed? 

Cheers.

replies.body: As far as I know, the "crunchy" sound issue was resolved, except for those using special EQ audio enhancing applications, which exacerbate the issue. Can you give me a bit more detail about what happens when your client crashes? Any specific error messages you see when it happens? With a bit more info, I can provide the right steps to resolve this.
